alert.note: Alert for Lamar (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 31 at 2:00PM CDT until March 31 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Lamar County in north central Texas... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 159 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lake Crook, or near Paris, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Paris, Blossom, Lake Crook, Arthur City, Powderly, Sumner, Lake Gibbons, Camp Maxey, Pat Mayse Lake, Novice, Sun Valley, Midcity and Faught. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
